info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 22 at 2:21PM MDT until June 22 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN DENVER AND NORTHERN JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 221 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Idledale, or 16 miles west of Denver, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... Golden and Red Rocks Park around 235 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Morrison, Lakewood, northern Englewood and Wheat Ridge. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
